This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the [[Overworld Update]] ({{BE}} 0.14.x releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 0.13.x releases.

==Mobs==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
|[[Witch]]
|[[File:Witch BE Revision 2.png|128px]]
|
* Witches can be generated in places where the [[Light#Light level|Lightness]] level is less than or equal to 7.
* [[Villagers]] located within 3 blocks of [[Lightning]] will turn into witches.
|
{{Drop|item|Glass Bottle|12.5%}}
{{Drop|item|Glowstone dust|12.5%}}
{{Drop|item|Gunpowder|12.5%}}
{{Drop|item|Redstone|id=redstone-dust|12.5%}}
{{Drop|item|Spider Eye|12.5%}}
{{Drop|item|Sugar|12.5%}}
{{Drop|item|Stick|25%}}
Randomly select 0-2 items and drop 1-3 items each, with a maximum of 6 items dropped in total.
|
* Use new sounds.
* There is a chance that the potion in hand will be dropped when killed by the player.
|}

{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|[[Baby zombie]]
|[[File:Baby Zombie Revision 1.png|128px]]
|
* Has a 15% chance of trying to ride other creatures. If this event is triggered, the following creatures will be prioritized before attacking the player:
** [[Chicken]]
** [[Ocelot]]
** [[Wolf]]
** [[Zombie]]
** [[Cow]]
** [[Pig]]
** [[Sheep]]
** [[Spider]]
|-
|[[Blaze]]
|[[File:Blaze BE2.png|128px]]

|-
|[[Creeper]]
|{{Animate|Creeper JE3 BE1.png; Charged Creeper.png|128px}}
|
* Got shorter (1.7 blocks tall instead of 1.8 blocks).
* The detection range for players wearing helmets is adjusted to 50% of the normal range.
* Explosions are more powerful and more consistent.
|-
|[[Enderman]]
|[[File:Enderman BE.png|240px]]
|Drops blocks in hand when killed.
|-
|[[Ghast]]
|[[File:Ghast JE1 BE1.gif|128px]]

|-
|[[Magma cube]]
|[[File:Magma Cube JE1 BE1.png|128px]]

|-

|{{Animate|Farmer.png; Librarian.png; Priest.png; Blacksmith.png; Butcher.png; Nitwit.png|128px}}
|

* Will turn into a [[witch]] when struck by lightning.
* More diverse occupations.

[[File:Baby Cow JE1 BE1.png|128px]]

|[[Mooshroom]]

[[File:Baby Red Mooshroom JE1 BE1.png|128px]]

==Gameplay==
===Changed===
{| {{Simple Guide table|Changed Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Creative mode]]
|
* Added survival mode tab.
* [[Chest]], [[anvil]], [[furnace]], [[dispenser]], [[dropper]], [[brewing stand]], [[enchantment table]] and [[hopper]] can interact with creative mode players.
* It is now possible to pick up 64 items by throwing them in [[creative mode]].
|-
|[[Texture]]
|
* Organized texture files.
* Updated texture and language buttons.
** Looks more like the Windows 10 version of the button.
|-
|[[Sound]]
|Changed the sounds of jumping into and swimming in water.
|-
|Animation
|
* New player burning animation.
* New entry animation.
|}
